name: Gravity Drive (itch)
description:
Gravity Drive was made for the GDQ One Mechanic Game Jam 4 and based on the themes Gravity and Loot.

You pilot a small ship equipped with an experimental Gravity Drive that provides it a special type of propulsion. You move to where you click and use your speed to destroy your enemies because you have no weapons. Collect the energy they drop to recover any lost health and earn bonus points if you already at max health.

Destroy your enemies, rack up a high combo, collect energy, and get the highest possible score you can in a game where gravity is your only tool.
